original_text: And the fruits that thy soul lusted after are departed from thee, and all things which were dainty and goodly are departed from thee, and thou shalt find them no more at all.
korean_text: 바벨론아 네 영혼이 탐하던 과일이 네게서 떠났으며 맛있는 것들과 빛난 것들이 다 없어졌으니 사람들이 결코 이것들을 다시 보지 못하리로다

sentences.original_text: And fruits that thy soul lusted after
and all things which were dainty and goodly
and thou shalt find them no more at all
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 더 이상 그것들을 결코 찾지 못하리라
